Hello, I want to find the best way to create a complete transaction via the API.

Let's say I have 2 products A & B and a contact : <mailto:john@gmail.com|john@gmail.com>

And I want, with the API to create a transaction for my contact with 2 line items : 1 for A and 1 for B

From what I saw in the doc, I need to make this sequence of API calls :
- Call 1 : Create the transaction : /crm/v3/objects/deals and get the transaction id.
- Call 2 : Get the contact id with the email
- Call 3 : Attach the transaction to the contact
- Call 4 : Create line item for A : /crm/v3/objects/line_items and get the line item id
- Call 5 : Create line item for B : /crm/v3/objects/line_items and get the line item id
- Call 6 : Attach line item A to transaction : /crm/v3/objects/line_items/%lite-item-id%/associations/deal/%deal-id%/line_item_to_deal
- Call 7 : Attach line item A to transaction : /crm/v3/objects/line_items/%lite-item-id%/associations/deal/%deal-id%/line_item_to_deal

My questions are :
Is there an easier way to proceed ?
Can I directly attach a transaction to a contact with just an email (just one call instead of 2 calls)?
Can a attach my 2 line_items to my transaction with just one call ?

Thanks in advance for your help

Best regards

Thomas
